fixes.name: Delta +50 T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustom,
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE],
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA50],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = EndDate,
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA50],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE(...) per rules: [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] -> SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]) and [Parameters].[End Date] -> SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As]). Transformed all field references to the table-qualified form 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Column]. Implemented the nested IF logic from Tableau using DAX IF and VAR for readability. Result is a measure because it depends on parameter values.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameter(s) [Use Custom Date] and [End Date]; all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
